lines.text: I love my daughter more than anything in the world. She's all I have.
You hurt her - I'll choke you to death with your own intestines. Got that?
Does this look like the body of a sixteen-year-old?
You know, Megan, you're turning into the same lying slut your mother was.
Listen, there's this party tonight.
Sweet 16?
Does this look like the body of a 16-year-old?
I have plans.
Well change 'em.
I guess I'm really fucked up, huh?
Talking isn't my best sport.
I want to feel you inside me, RIGHT NOW!
I wanna do something with my life. I don't wanna be a fuck-up like you.
[Wes has a gun on Megan]
What are you gonna do to me?
I don't know. What *should* I do to a lying, murdering *bitch* like you?
Why don't we start by having you take your clothes off?
Wes and his amazing penis.

[to Megan, regarding the large stuffed animal covering her naked body]
Nice duck.
[last lines]

[to the detective]
Here's your fuckin' wire.
